dev.nick.imageloader

类 ImageLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.nick.imageloader.ImageLoader
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Forkable<ImageLoader,LoaderConfig>, DisplayTaskMonitor, FutureImageTask.DoneListener, RequestHandler<FutureImageTask>

    public class ImageLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements DisplayTaskMonitor, RequestHandler<FutureImageTask>, FutureImageTask.DoneListener, Forkable<ImageLoader,LoaderConfig>
    Main class of ImageLoader library.

                         @NonNull
                         ImageView view,

                         DisplayOption option,
                         @Nullable
                         DisplayListener loadingListener)
        Display image from the url to the view.
        参数:
        url - Image source url, one of ImageSource
        view - Target view to display the image.
        option - DisplayOption is options using when display the image.
        loadingListener - The listener.
